__e: This creature is the mother of her race.
Yes, sir, but... but this creature is a special case.
Does this poor creature is responsible for what it is?
No, you must go on a bit longer as a creature of the sun. Only until we have left behind those who would destroy us.
What could I do with that cursed fellow?
I want to come out together.
She was the most beautiful creature I'd seen that day.
He, and the Earth creature went to the reception area.
He looked like an Earth creature.
I know the truth when I see it. But what we saw was not God's creation.
For no creatures under God are as we are. None so like Him as ourselves.
He looked like an Earth creature.
I believe this is also a living creature.
There is not a single live creature on our planet now.
There's no other living creature than the professor and his wife, Captain.
The creature that made this must have been gigantic.
You must understand that we have to catch the creature that ate your wife and if you could help us answer a few questions we may be able to help save a few lives.
You are a creature who has received pain and given pain and taken too much joy in its application.
I have an appointment this evening... with the most beautiful creature I've ever seen.
This afternoon, you try to ruin a man who's 10 times your better and when you were finished you toted out of here in the footsteps of a thing not even fit to breath.
A creature that's been alive for 3,000 years is in this town... and it's brought death with it.
If there is any kindness I can show to any creature, let me do it now for I shall not pass this way again.
Still, that advice is so far worth taking I have never taken it myself and am the miserable creature you behold.
I was thinking that... you're the most beautiful creature... I've ever seen.
